Install package from source

Source: R/install.source.R
install.source.Rd

Install package from source

install.source(
  pkg_vrs,
  lib,
  date,
  force.download = FALSE,
  quiet.install = FALSE
)

Arguments

pkg_vrs

character. The required package and its version separated by an underscore.
lib

character. Path where to install the package.
date

date (in the format "%Y-%m-%d"), Required date for the package.
force.download

logical (defaults to FALSE). If the tarball containing the package source code already exists locally, should it be downloaded again?
quiet.install

Logical (defaults to TRUE).Run install.packages() with quiet = TRUE?

Value

Invisible NULL.

Contents

Developed by Uri Simonsohn, Hugo Gruson.
